definition: in confusion or disorder/in a confused state of mind/disorder/upheaval/riot/illicit sexual relations/to throw into disorder/to mix up/indiscriminate/random/arbitrary
dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Ambush fir in ci to see huang feng, etc.
sentences.chinese: 埋伏在乱石堆里杉木看见黄鸣锋等人。

sentences.english: They riprapped the dykes of the reservoir with stone.
sentences.chinese: 他们用乱石基加固水库的堤坝。

sentences.english: Three of her relatives were killed by stoning.
sentences.chinese: 她的三个亲戚就被乱石砸死。

sentences.english: And who knows, you might even uncover a diamond in the rough.
sentences.chinese: 谁知道呢，你可能甚至会在乱石碎砾中找到钻石。

sentences.english: Once the laborers died, their remains were thrown into mountain gullies or pits dug into bare hillsides .
sentences.chinese: 华工被迫害致死后，被扔进山沟或乱石坑。

sentences.english: The Titans acknowledgmented him by a battery of great rocks and upabiding copse.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦们拔起大树，并且掷出一阵乱石答复了他。

sentences.english: The back mountain is only a barren one, whose pathway is full of stone riprap and overgrown with weeds, rugged and rough, difficult to walk by foot.
sentences.chinese: 后山不过是个虚山，山径乱石野草，崎岖难行。

sentences.english: The Titans answered him by a shower of great rocks and uprooted trees.
sentences.chinese: 泰坦们拔起大树，并且掷出一阵乱石回答了他。

sentences.english: The interference of confused stone heap is also discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对乱石堆造成的干扰进行了讨论。

sentences.english: When he failed, he was stoned and beheaded.
sentences.chinese: 他失败了，于是被乱石砸死并被砍了头。

sentences.english: The field of rubble is moving, glacier-like, towards the street.
sentences.chinese: 乱石被移开了，向冰川似的堆在街头。

definition: crushed or broken rock, stone etc
Jianshi or Chienshih township in Hsinchu County 新竹縣|新竹县[Xin1 zhu2 Xian4], northwest Taiwan
